description: Strengthening Capacities of the Ministry of Justice of Montenegro

subproject.corporate outcome: Efficient and responsive line ministries, local governments and justice systems that promote democratic values and empower citizens.
subproject.description: The goal of the project is to provide capacity building support to the Ministry of Justice in the key areas of priority, which represent the foundation of its successful functioning: 1) organisational setup of the Ministry; 2) management capacities of the Ministry’s staff; 3) European integration and international legal assistance/co-operation policies; 4) information technology capacities of the Ministry; 5) public relations aspect of the Ministry’s operations. The purpose of the project is to contribute to the achievement of an efficient, effective and transparent system which is able to implement its challenging mandate.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Strength. Ministry of Justice
